items.title: Sometimes you just have to guess

content1.text: Comic Bob is a story-driven puzzle game where you see one of two choices in a series of tricky situations. It has a lot of humor, some pretty impressive graphics, and much more to expect. But don’t be fooled by the charm. Comic Bob can be a difficult game to understand. And that’s why we wrote this guide. Packed with the best tips, tips and tricks you’ve found while playing the game. Following these, it’s easy to see that Comics Bob is a much more palatable and easier experience. Even if you’ve already played Comic Bob, I think it can be useful here. Tips are also essential for new players. So here are the top 5 tips, tips and cheats for Comic Bob.

content2.text: You will make a mistake with Comic Bob, that’s the way things are done. However, it’s important to remember where you failed, as you may have to solve some puzzles again before returning to where you failed. Remember the choices you made, and you will be fully placed to solve the puzzle in the next round.

content3.text: If you make a mistake, the game gives you the opportunity to watch the video and try your choice again. It’s always worth doing this at the end of the level. Otherwise you will have to go back and start all over again. If you make a mistake early in the level, your choice is up to you. However, it takes as long as restarting the level from the beginning, so it is recommended that you do not do it on your first challenge.

content4.text: When you don’t know what to do, it’s worth making the most obvious choice. For half the time this will work. Keep in mind that basically every challenge has a 50/50 chance. At least if something goes wrong, you know for sure what to choose next time.

content5.text: From time to time, you can get clues about the choices you need to make from what happened in the story. Think about what happened recently and how they fit your decision. Comic Bob is essentially a game about remembering things. The more you remember, the better you can do it.

content6.text: After all, you may have to randomly choose one of the options. It can be pretty frustrating, but at least the failed animations are pretty funny. When you’ve run out of thought processes, it’s best to take one of the options and expect the best. You never know, you may get it right.

content7.text: 1. Solve puzzles. 2. Help Bob find his true love in this dangerous prehistoric world. 3. Turn on your brain, intuition and get ready to laugh a lot!

content8.text: This game is packed with tricky situations which outcome depends on you. I am Bob gives you new interactive experience. Just make a choice and enjoy beautifully performed outcome. Situations Bob gets into will make laugh both kid and your granny.
